about_the_game:
The world is a noisy place. If silence is golden, that's because it's so hard to find... and you won't find any here! This collection of SFX has birds and bags, cooking, cicadas, dice rolling, doors closing, and much more. Most sounds have multiple variations for variety's sake. Give your world some sound!

Open your ears and you'll hear all around you the sounds of everyday life. The birds outside, the clatter of cookware, doors and drawers opening and shutting, water splashing and pouring... this is the backdrop of our lives and of your game! Everyday items and situations are covered in this collection, with multiple takes on most sounds so you have a variety to choose from. Listen up! This set of Modern Day SFX will liven up your world.

This pack contains:

  • 450 SFX for modern-day settings focusing on domestic life
  • .wav and .ogg formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in RPG Maker or the engine of your choice
  • Click the Online Manual URL to download a handy PDF with the pack's file names - a great way to get an idea of what's included in this pack!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Modern Day SFX

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: RPG Maker MV - Modern Day SFX - $19.99 $5.99

package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Modern Day SFX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: This collection of SFX has birds and bags, cooking, cicadas, dice rolling, doors closing, and much more.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
